subject: Hsbc Bank Birmingham Uk
body:

subject: Re: Hsbc Bank Birmingham Uk
body:
Hello Mr. Eugene Michal,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the claim of my fund. I apologize for any confusion, but I don't recall taking an oath or being aware of this fund. Could you please provide me with more information about it? I want to make sure I understand the situation correctly before making any decisions.

Could you explain how this fund came about and why it is being held by HSBC Bank in Birmingham, UK? Additionally, what is the purpose of the Affidavit of Claim Clearance that you mentioned?

I appreciate your assistance in clarifying these details.

Best wishes,
Denise

subject: Re: Hsbc Bank Birmingham Uk
body: If you are ready to receive your total fund

subject: Re: Hsbc Bank Birmingham Uk
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about this total fund you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

Best wishes,
Denise
